data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: A young man is practicing shooting using a shotgun. He is wearing a green jacket and jeans. He seems not very familiar with the gun. An elder guy is standing behind him and teaching him how to use the gun. The older man must be a good shooter. Typically, participants will be under the guidance and close one on one supervision of an experienced coach at all times. I had this experience once, and usually, the day will begin with an introduction to gun safety and clay target shooting tips. Next, you will head out to the layout, where you will receive individual coaching to hone your skills further. Shooting is fun and exciting and provides a great insight into the skills and techniques involved across shooting disciplines and experiences. (130 words)
